hints.label: cor-structural-error-contraction
hints.title: Structural Error Contraction
hints.content:
6858: :label: cor-structural-error-contraction
6859: 
6860: Under the same conditions as Theorem 10.3.1, the structural error also contracts:
6861: 
6862: $$
6863: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone}}[V_{\text{struct}}(S'_1, S'_2)] \leq (1 - \kappa_{\text{struct}}) V_{\text{struct}}(S_1, S_2) + C_{\text{struct}}
6864: $$
hints.raw_directive:
6855: The positional variance contraction has immediate consequences for the structural error $V_{\text{struct}}$.
6856: 
6857: :::{prf:corollary} Structural Error Contraction
6858: :label: cor-structural-error-contraction
6859: 
6860: Under the same conditions as Theorem 10.3.1, the structural error also contracts:
6861: 
6862: $$
6863: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone}}[V_{\text{struct}}(S'_1, S'_2)] \leq (1 - \kappa_{\text{struct}}) V_{\text{struct}}(S_1, S_2) + C_{\text{struct}}
6864: $$
6865:

hints.label: proof-cor-structural-error-contraction
hints.content:
6869: :::{prf:proof}
6870: :label: proof-cor-structural-error-contraction
6871: **Proof.**
6872: 
6873: By Lemma 3.2.4:
6874: 
6875: $$
6876: V_{\text{struct}} \leq 2(\text{Var}_1(x) + \text{Var}_2(x))
6877: $$
6878: 
6879: where $\text{Var}_k(x) = \frac{1}{k_{\text{alive}}} \sum_{i \in \mathcal{A}(S_k)} \|\delta_{x,k,i}\|^2$.
6880: 
6881: The contraction of $V_{\text{Var},x}$ (which is proportional to the sum of these variances) immediately implies contraction of $V_{\text{struct}}$.
6882: 
6883: The constant $\kappa_{\text{struct}}$ depends on $\kappa_x$ and the relationship between $N$-normalized and $k_{\text{alive}}$-normalized variances.

6880: 
6881: The contraction of $V_{\text{Var},x}$ (which is proportional to the sum of these variances) immediately implies contraction of $V_{\text{struct}}$.
6882: 
6883: The constant $\kappa_{\text{struct}}$ depends on $\kappa_x$ and the relationship between $N$-normalized and $k_{\text{alive}}$-normalized variances.
